message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. To be honest, that's a bit higher than I was hoping to spend.  Would you consider $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. $130 is closer, but still a bit more than I can swing. Would you be willing to do it for $110?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $110 is cutting it pretty close to my bottom line. How about we split the difference and call it $120?
